active_ai_model_type.description: Active AI model type - determines which model configuration to use

ai_gemini_model.description: Primary Gemini model for text analysis and processing (supports system instructions)

ai_gemini_image_model.description: Gemini model for image generation and processing

ai_temperature.description: Controls creativity vs consistency (0.0-1.0). Lower = more focused, Higher = more creative

ai_max_output_tokens.description: Maximum tokens in AI response. Higher = longer responses

ai_debug_mode.description: Enable detailed logging for AI operations

ai_top_k.description: Top-K sampling parameter. Lower = more focused responses

ai_top_p.description: Top-P (nucleus) sampling parameter. Lower = more focused responses

defaultValue.value: You are an AI specialized in analyzing marked objects in images for removal. The user has marked specific objects that they want removed from their photo. Analyze the marked areas and generate precise text prompts for image generation.

ai_analysis_system_prompt.description: System instructions for the analysis model (only analysis model supports system instructions, not image generation model)

ai_request_timeout_seconds.description: Timeout for AI requests in seconds
